page.title: 03Huntley Quarry-Conservation
page.content:
To hide Huntley Wood Sand and Gravel Quarry from the view of all the houses round about, the Company did not dig into the surrounding bank and top soil has been placed in appropriate locations for tree planting.
In 7 to 10 years the Company will have exhausted the useful and easily reached deposits and will close this site and transfer operations to another nearby location.
The Company do not know what they will do with the site as yet, but they cannot just abandon it. It may be turned into an area for woodland, as it was before quarrying began, and become available for recreation.
